## gpiochipOpen() function

This returns a handle to a gpiochip device.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function gpiochipOpen(gpioDev: number): number;
```

</th><th>

</td><td>

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number

The GPIO device handle.
